text: David "Smokey" Gaines (February 27, 1942 â€“ September 5, 2020) was an American basketball player and coach. He played professionally for three games for the Kentucky Colonels. He also plated for the Harlem Globetrotters. He was head coach for the Detroit Mercy and San Diego State Aztecs. Gaines died on September 5, 2020 from cancer, aged 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in the United States Category:American basketball players Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: David Gaines (basketball)
